basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, fruiting period April-May
basic.color: Flower color purple red, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Neutral or slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
